meanings.definition: The quality or state of being orderly.
meanings.sent1: Her room's orderliness made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent2: The orderliness of the books on the shelf impressed the librarian.
meanings.sent3: The orderliness of the puzzle pieces made it a breeze to put together.
meanings.sent4: The orderliness of the garden resembled a perfectly choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The orderliness of his notes helped him ace the exam.

meanings.definition: A state of being well-arranged or organized.
meanings.sent1: The orderliness of the files on his desk was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The orderliness of the grocery store made shopping a pleasant experience.
meanings.sent3: The orderliness of the dog's toys scattered around the house was comical.
meanings.sent4: The orderliness of the city streets was like a symphony of traffic.
meanings.sent5: The orderliness of her schedule kept her day running smoothly.
